casebody.data:
2001-2964 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Zebedee M. LOTT. No. 2001-KO-2964. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Lott, Zebedee M.;—Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of St. Tammany, 22nd Judicial District Court Div. A, No. 316820; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. 2000 KA 2832.

Denied.

WEIMER, J., recused.
